thread.title: Watch live: Giant panda Bao Bao leaves National Zoo for China

author: USA TODAY
title: Watch live: Giant panda Bao Bao leaves National Zoo for China
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Watch live: Giant panda Bao Bao leaves National Zoo for China The Smithsonian Institution’s National Zoo will say goodbye to giant panda Bao Bao, who is headed to her new home in China. Bao Bao, 3, will be welcomed aboard the FedEx Panda Express for safe travels to Chengdu, China, on Feb. 21. A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 2 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Watch live: Giant panda Bao Bao leaves National Zoo for China USA TODAY 10:13 a.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 Bao Bao in her enclosure. (Photo: Jasper Colt, USA TODAY) 29 CONNECT 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Smithsonian Institution’s National Zoo will say goodbye to giant panda Bao Bao, who is headed to her new home in China. Bao Bao, 3, will be welcomed aboard the FedEx Panda Express for safe travels to Chengdu, China, on Tuesday. One keeper and one veterinarian will fly with the panda to monitor her during the trip and feed Bao Bao her favorite treats, including bamboo, apples, pears and cooked sweet potatoes. You can watch Bao Bao begin her journey live in the player above. CLOSE
